akn:section.akn:heading: Board of Elections — Qualifications; prohibited activities; compensation; removal; time for filling vacancy.

akn:content.akn:p: When appointing a member of the Board, the Mayor and Council shall consider whether the individual possesses demonstrated integrity, independence, and public credibility and whether the individual has particular knowledge, training, or experience in government ethics or in elections law and procedure. Each member of the Board, including the Chairman, shall receive compensation as provided in § 1-611.08(c)(2).
Any vacancy occurring on the Board shall be filled within 45 days after the occurrence of such vacancy, excluding Saturdays, Sundays, and holidays.
